item.title: ctfs && recon
item.description: We’ll get started at ??:05 week01 What is a ctf && recon what is a ctf what are we going to cover recon injection vulnerabilities how the following simple code could be used to get full server takeover #include <stdio.h> int main(void) { char buffer[64]; gets(buffer); } reconnaisance asymmetry of attack and defense passive recon demo active recon subdomain/subdirectory bruteforcing over dns vs http port enumeration considerations very noisy might be blocked demo thank you we’re done!
